column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////As a Floridian visiting Chicago
column2: my knowledge of deep dish pizza is very limited so we relied on a buddy of mine who is a local for his recommendation. He recommended we check out Lou Malnati's in downtown and he was not wrong. The pizza was legit. Being used to very commercial
column3: crappy pizza down in Florida this was a treat. Just make sure you give yourself plenty of time as they did warn us upon ordering that it'd take about 40 minutes for the pizza to be ready
